description:
Having taking away the bottle of candies, Melmo`s brother, Totoo, keeps teasing her and won`t give it back. Melmo tries to make him return it, but Totoo won`t give it to her. Melmo decides to teach him how to use the candies to turn into an animal. She plans to get the bottle of candies back while Totoo is in the form of an animal. Totoo then turns into a frog. Melmo is now in trouble, because a frog cannot eat the candy when she wants to turn him back into Totoo. And it can`t even take the water that she could dissolve the candies into. 
Source: tezukaosamu.net

titles.title: A Night at the Mansion of the Lizard
